title: PVP.net Patcher kernal has stoped working?
body: so when I click league this pops up what's the deal?

replies.body: Are you running Windows 8? If you are, right click on the LoL shortcut and select to run as administrator.
This seems to have worked, thanks.
Im running on windows 7, run it as administrators, did everything else but still isn't working
Try disabling IPv6 and disable IP Helper
Mine just started doing the same thing today out of the blue, no clue why or whats going on.
I got this too, and when it does get to the launcher it fails to authenticate me and closes out of league. Been happening today and for the past 4 days.
Yeah, I've been getting the same thing, tried to uninstall and reinstall and keep getting the same message.
